hero.title: Experience
hero.subtitle: Exclusive Luxury
hero.description: Premium hookah rentals for your special occasions, events, and private gatherings.

home.featuredServicesDescription: Explore our most popular and trusted services handpicked for you.
home.aboutUsDescription1: We are a passionate team dedicated to delivering quality and value through our expertise and experience.
home.aboutUsDescription2: Our mission is to provide exceptional service and build lasting relationships with our clients.

story.pageDescription: Where we started and how far we've come

1.title: Birth of Taisha
1.paragraph1: Founded on principles of exceptional quality and unparalleled service, Lux Hookah brings the ancient tradition of hookah to modern luxury settings. Our journey began with a passion for creating memorable experiences.
1.paragraph2: Every hookah we provide is meticulously crafted and prepared by experts who understand the art and science of perfect flavor profiles.

2.title: Exceptional Quality
2.paragraph1: We source only the finest materials and premium tobacco blends from around the world. Our collection features exclusive designs that combine traditional craftsmanship with modern aesthetics.
2.paragraph2: Each piece in our inventory undergoes rigorous quality checks to ensure a flawless experience for our clients.

3.title: Bespoke Experiences
3.paragraph1: We understand that every event is unique. Our team works closely with you to create a tailored hookah experience that perfectly complements your occasion, whether it's an intimate gathering or a grand celebration.
3.paragraph2: From flavor selection to setup aesthetics, every detail is customized to exceed your expectations.

4.title: Professional Service
4.paragraph1: Our trained specialists not only set up and maintain your hookah throughout your event but also provide guidance on flavor combinations and optimal enjoyment techniques.
4.paragraph2: With discreet, attentive service, we ensure your experience is seamless and your guests are impressed by both the quality of our products and our staff.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Explore our range of premium hookah rental services designed to elevate your experience. Click on any service to learn more about pricing and details.

event.title: Event Hookah Service
event.description: Complete hookah service for weddings, corporate events, and celebrations. Includes professional setup, attendant service, and premium flavors.

private.title: Private Lounge Experience
private.description: Transform your space into a luxury hookah lounge. Includes premium hookahs, flavor selection, and comfortable seating arrangements.

vip.title: VIP Hookah Experience
vip.description: Our most exclusive service featuring rare tobacco blends, limited edition hookahs, and personalized flavor creation with our master blender.

corporate.title: Corporate Event Package
corporate.description: Customized hookah services for corporate gatherings, team-building events, and business celebrations. Includes branded options.

flavor.title: Premium Flavor Experience
flavor.description: Taste-focused package featuring our collection of exclusive premium tobacco blends from around the world, with expert flavor guidance.

equipment.title: Equipment Rental
equipment.description: High-end hookah equipment rental for those who prefer to create their own experience. Includes delivery, setup instructions, and pickup.

menu.title: Our Menu
menu.subtitle: Explore our extensive selection of premium hookah flavors and accessories. Download our menu for complete details on our offerings.

catalog.title: Lux Hookah Menu
catalog.description: Our complete catalog of premium hookahs, exclusive tobacco blends, and signature services.

flavors.title: Premium Flavors
flavors.description: Exclusive tobacco blends from around the world, including rare and limited editions.

hookahs.title: Signature Hookahs
hookahs.description: Our collection of designer hookah pipes, featuring traditional and modern styles.

packages.title: Service Packages
packages.description: Detailed information on our service packages, including pricing and special offers.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Reach out to discuss your next event or inquire about our premium hookah rental services.

location.title: The area we cover includes the Municipality of Bucharest and Ilfov (transport included), as well as the entire central-southern region of Romania. We love to travel and we can go anywhere in Romania or abroad; however, for more distant locations, transport and accommodation costs will apply.
